name: Gulf Aviation, Inc.
about: Gulf Aviation Academy (GAA), established in 2009 under the royal directives of His Majesty, King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa, is the Kingdom of Bahrain's premier provider of high-quality aviation and logistics training. As a subsidiary of the Bahrain Mumtalakat Holding Company, GAA is committed to supplying the country's future demand for Bahraini-trained commercial pilots. The academy has partnered with renowned institutions like the Oxford Aviation Academy and Aerodynamics Academy in Spain to offer comprehensive Ab-Initio training programs. GAA is accredited by EASA and IATA, and it has received multiple international awards for its training excellence. With a focus on state-of-the-art training methods and a strategic alliance with simulator manufacturers, GAA ensures its students receive the best possible education to become professional pilots. GAA's mission is to provide top-tier training, ensuring its graduates are ready for careers with leading airlines.
